"We feel very fortunate to be in such good hands with such quality professionals!" "Thank you Jeremy Wigley and Kim Martin for the exceptional work and service." "They treat people with kindness, and are true to their word."

The team at Pool Environments are some of the most professional, punctual, and customer service-oriented people that I have seen in this industry. Jacob has been taking excellent care of our new pool and always responds quickly to questions … More Response from the owner 11 months ago Alan, we thank you for the great review and will pass it on to our team.  As always we are for any of your pool needs and look forward to continuing to work with you.

We have had a great experience with Pool Environments. We recently had them build our pool, spa, and an outdoor patio for our new house. They were professional, courteous, and extremely easy to work with, and the transition to Azure to … More Response from the owner 11 months ago Pritam, we thank for your great review and will be sure to let Jeremy and Kim know as well.  And look forward to continuing to take care of you.

We are really happy with our pool renovation by Pool Environments and can recommend without reservation. Every aspect of this custom project was top notch from planning to execution. Totally satisfied - would call Scott or Jacob in a heartbeat for any future need.
